name: Beanie Alba
suggested_yarn: Lion Brand Wool Ease Solids, Heathers, Twists
full_text: Español - English below Beanie Alba is a very quick and easy hat to knit designed for the whole family, from babies to adults. It is worked from the bottom up in simple 1x1 rib stitch. The bottom part has an edge that is folded, this is optional so if you prefer you can knit it shorter to use it without folding. At the top or crown it has double centered decreases which gives the effect of 4 points that continue in a straight line until the closure. General information Sizes 1 (2, 3, 4) (5, 6) designed for baby, child, teenager, small adult, medium adult and large adult. Suggested yarn: Approximately 55 (65, 70, 80) (85, 95) gr / 97 (116, 124, 140) (150, 170) m of worsted thickness yarn. Consider that the amount not only depends on the size, but also on the material composition, your tension and the length of the hat you knit, so the values ​​are only referential. Suggested needles: Circular or double pointed needle size 4.5 mm (US 7) Gauge: 26 stitches x 28 turns in 10 cm; knitted in 1x1 single rib knit without stretching. Other materials: Wool needle. Scissors. Stitch marker. Thank you for your interest in my pattern. Please don't forget to share your project on Instagram with the hashtag #BeanieAlba and tag me @jooanfossiknits I will be more than happy to see your creations. Enjoy knitting Alba beanie! English Beanie Alba is a quick and easy to knit beanie designed for everyone, from babies to adults. The construction is seamless from the bottom up, knitting 1×1 rib stitch in the round. The bottom part has a folded edge, this is optional so if you prefer you can knit it shorter to use without a fold. In the crown it has centered double decreases, which gives the effect of 4 stitches that continue in a straight line until the closure. Sizes: The pattern includes 6 sizes 1 (2, 3, 4) (5, 6) designed for baby, toddler/kid, teenager, adult small, adult medium and adult large. Recommended yarn: About 55 (65, 70, 80) (85, 95) gr / 97 (116, 124, 140) (150, 170) m of worsted weight yarn. The amount depends not only on the size, but also on the yarn's composition, gauge and hat length. Recommended needles: US 7 (4.5 mm) circular needle or double point needles if you prefer. Gauge: 26 stitches x 28 rounds per 10 cm (4 inch) in 1x1 rib stitch unstretched. Notions: Tapestry needle. Scissors. Removable or progress markers. Thanks for knitting my pattern. Please, Don't forget to share your project on instagram using the hashtag #BeanieAlba and tag my account @jooanfossiknits I'll be more than happy to see your creations.
